params.expirationTime: The expiration time of the attestation.

returns._0: The UUID of the new attestation.

attestByDelegation(address,bytes32,uint3.details: Attests to a specific schema using the provided EIP712 signature.

params.expirationTime: The expiration time of the attestation.
params.r: The x-coordinate of the nonce R.

returns._0: The UUID of the new attestation.

params.registry: The address of the global schema registry.
params.verifier: The address of the EIP712 verifier.

getAttestation(bytes32).details: Returns an existing attestation by UUID.

getSchemaRegistry().details: Returns the address of the global schema registry.
